question_text:
Question 62 
[Operating System (Memory management and Virtual Memory)]
 
 
Consider a memory management system that uses a page size of 2 KB.   Assume that both the physical 
and virtual addresses start from 0.  Assume that the pages 0, 1, 2, and 3 are stored in the page frames 1, 3, 
2, and 0, respectively.  The physical address (in decimal format) corresponding to the virtual address 2500 
(in decimal format) is ________. 
Ans. 
(6596 to 6596)
11
2KB
2 B


